page.title: 09SHOPPING IN SUTTON VENY
page.content:
I live in Sutton Veny and I go to the Post Office and village shop on Monday. When I go to the Post Office I look around and there are lots of different things for sale. There are sweets, rice, ice-lollies, dog and cat food, rulers, combs and toilet rolls. I have a savings book with the Post Office.
A milkman comes on most days of the week to our house. On Saturday a baker and a butcher come and a fruit van. Some old people come out and buy food from the vans because they don't like going out very far. I go to Warminster with my Mum on Saturdays to do some shopping and sometimes I go to the park.
